spell1.name: LIFE ENERGY BLAST
spell1.description: Fire an energy thorn and regain one Life Orb after a critical hit.

spell2.name: SOUL RESURGENCE
spell2.description: Release energy around her while moving, providing Healing Over Time and Movement Boosts for surrounding allies. Excess healing converts to Bonus Health.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Persistent spell field that surrounds the caster

spell3.name: SPORE SLUMBER
spell3.description: Throw a spore to Sedate the nearest enemy.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Single-cast projectile with delayed impact that also generates a spell field

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: A Mantis illusion will manifest beside the sedated heroes. Allies can attack this illusion to awaken the affected hero

spell4.name: ALLIED INSPIRATION
spell4.description: Consume Life Orbs to grant allies a Damage Boost.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Life Orb charges & cooldowns shared between Allied Inspiration, Natural Anger, and Healing Flower

spell5.name: NATURAL ANGER
spell5.description: Consume Life Orbs to grant herself a Damage Boost.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Life Orb charges & cooldowns shared between Allied Inspiration, Natural Anger, and Healing Flower

spell6.name: HEALING FLOWER
spell6.description: Consume Life Orbs to grant allies Healing Over Time.

attributes.label: PERCENTAGE HEALING
attributes.value: Heal allies equal to 2.5% of the target's Max Health/s

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Life Orb charges & cooldowns shared between Allied Inspiration, Natural Anger, and Healing Flower âš¬ Has stacking properties, meaning that if you apply this to an ally twice, the duration is increased instead of resetting the timer.

spell7.name: NATURE'S FAVOR
spell7.description: Receive a Movement Boost when not injured and Healing Over Time when consuming Life Orbs.
